product_name: Boaters Guide to Lake Powell - 5th Edition
long_description: The emphasis of this book is on hiking with boat access. Also covers camping, geology, history and archaeology. Author: Michael R. Kelsey. Softcover; 288 pages; color photographs and black-and-white maps. Kelsey Publishing; copyright 2008. Author covers history of the early pioneers and cattlemen, geology and tips for staying safe in canyon country. 43 mapped areas indicate inlets and the canyons above, and include highly detailed hiking and camping information.
short_description: The emphasis of this book is on hiking with boat access. Also covers camping, geology, history and archaeology.
